alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Haywood; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Crockett, Weakley, Gibson, eastern Obion, western Carroll, east central Haywood and northern Madison Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hickman to near Dyer to near Holly Grove. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Martin, Union City, Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Fulton, Fairview, Dresden, Alamo, Bells, South Fulton, Dyer, Greenfield, Three Way, Gleason, Troy, Kenton, Rutherford and Bradford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
